attributes.action: Stop all holiday lets, hotels & airlines increasing prices for school holidays.
attributes.additional_details:
Its unfair that a holiday to cornwall for a family of 4 for 1 week is £269 in school term. 
The exact same holiday 2 weeks later in school holidays is £989.
Everyone agrees taking children out of school is not good for their education. 
But how can families afford to have holidays with unrealistic prices. 
The government  needs to step in and stop the ludicrous price increases for school holidays.
attributes.background:
Stop holiday companies increasing prices for school holidays. 
Family time is important, children need holidays to experience time away from the home. 
Parents and children need to have fun together and do new things. 
Mental health is important!
